name: Manager for Icomoon
author: Julien Crego

sections.description: This plugin makes it easy to integrate an icon font built from the Icomoon site. Icons then easily integrate into your content via a shortcode
sections.installation:
• Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/managerforicomoon/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen – directly.
  • Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen in WordPress
  • Use the Icomoon’s settings to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
2.3.4

  • Fix the retrieval of codes for colored icons.

2.3.2

  • Minor improvements.

2.3.1

  • Correction of some French translations.

2.3

  • Improves the ergonomics of inserting an icon via shortcode in the Gutenberg editor
  • Adds the ability to insert icons directly in HTML in the Gutenberg editor
  • Adds HTML code for each icon in icons list
  • Adds new copy options

2.2.1

  • Fix typo and french translation correction

2.2

  • Fix Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in shortcode

2.1

  • Fix security issue when uploading zip archive

2.0

  • Fix a bug with the update of the plugin which restore default police pack. PLEASE DOWNLOAD YOUR SELECTION.JSON BEFORE UPLOAD
  • Add a shortcode manager in the gutenberg editor
  • Add css minification feature
  • Manage params automatically from selection.json
  • Add postfix settings

1.2.2

  • Fix bug with old version of settings

1.2

  • New application logo
  • Design improvement
  • Add button to copy shortcode to clipboard
  • Disable/Enable restore button when checking the box

1.1

  • Update of the backoffice design
  • Fix a part of the english translation
  • Add a link to download the selection.json file
  • Add the possibility to restore the default icons set

1.0.8

  • Fix preview for icon with numbers in name

1.0.7

  • Fix url for plugin repository
  • Correct small translation errors

1.0.6

  • Fix bug for type mime application/x-zip-compressed

1.0

  • First version of the plugin
